Sentencas: Perovskite materials are considered to be promising electrolyte membrane candidates for electrochemical applications owing to their excellent proton- or oxide-ion-conducting properties.
Titulo: Theoretical Investigation of Proton Diffusion in Dion-Jacobson Layered Perovskite RbBiNb2O7

Sentencas: RbBiNb2O7 is a double-layered Dion-Jacobson perovskite oxide, with Pmc2(1) symmetry.
Titulo: Theoretical Investigation of Proton Diffusion in Dion-Jacobson Layered Perovskite RbBiNb2O7

Sentencas: In this study, the electronic structure and proton-diffusion properties of bulk RbBiNb2O7 were systematically investigated using first-principles calculations.
Titulo: Theoretical Investigation of Proton Diffusion in Dion-Jacobson Layered Perovskite RbBiNb2O7

Sentencas: The unique layered crystal structure of RbBiNb2O7 plays a crucial role in proton storage and proton conductivity.
Titulo: Theoretical Investigation of Proton Diffusion in Dion-Jacobson Layered Perovskite RbBiNb2O7

Sentencas: Different proton-diffusion steps in RbBiNb2O7 were considered, and the activation energies of the relevant diffusion steps were evaluated using the climbing image-nudged elastic band (CI-NEB) technique.
Titulo: Theoretical Investigation of Proton Diffusion in Dion-Jacobson Layered Perovskite RbBiNb2O7

Sentencas: The proton diffusion in RbBiNb2O7 presents a two-dimensional layered characteristic in the a-b plane, owing to its layered crystalline nature.
Titulo: Theoretical Investigation of Proton Diffusion in Dion-Jacobson Layered Perovskite RbBiNb2O7

Sentencas: According to the transition state calculations, our results show that the bulk RbBiNb2O7 exhibits good proton-transport behavior in the a-b plane, which is better than many perovskite oxides, such as CaTiO3, CaZrO3, and SrZrO3.
Titulo: Theoretical Investigation of Proton Diffusion in Dion-Jacobson Layered Perovskite RbBiNb2O7

Sentencas: The proton diffusion in the Rb-O and Nb-O layers is isolated by a higher energy barrier of 0.86 eV.
Titulo: Theoretical Investigation of Proton Diffusion in Dion-Jacobson Layered Perovskite RbBiNb2O7

Sentencas: The strong octahedral tilting in RbBiNb2O7 would promote proton transport.
Titulo: Theoretical Investigation of Proton Diffusion in Dion-Jacobson Layered Perovskite RbBiNb2O7

Sentencas: Our study reveals the microscopic mechanisms of proton conductivity in Dion-Jacobson structured RbBiNb2O7, and provides theoretical evidence for its potential application as an electrolyte in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Theoretical Investigation of Proton Diffusion in Dion-Jacobson Layered Perovskite RbBiNb2O7
